override.description:
Have EnSight execute a system command.
| A typical use of this command might be to move animation images from the local directory to an archive location.
Args: p0: 'str' a system command line
Examples: | #WARNING: the following line failed to translate because the function could not be found in the ensight python module | # Actual error: module 'ensight.shell' has no attribute 'cp' | ensight.sendmesg(r"shell: cp image*.rgb /scratch/archive/")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error
